channel.title: Michael Angarano on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Devil in Disguise’ Trailer Sees Michael Chernus’ John Wayne Gacy Lure His Victims
item.description: Michael Angarano portrays Sam Amirante, a lawyer who struggles with defending the murderer in the eight-episode Peacock series.
